name: Escape The Dead VR(Prototype)
description:
This Game requires a controller.

It's only in early access so please go easy on me, I just wanna try something about vr and this is the most accessible even tho vr in mobile kinda sucks so i put together this simple game for about a week then tried it out to be published to play store.

Escape the dead is a stealth survival game where the player will have to hide, evade and escape from the undead killers while fulfilling missions to complete the escape.

You can't fight back, all you can do is run, evade or hide from them to complete your mission. Use the obstacles to shake off chasers and be hidden at all times.

There are different environments with different missions with various undead lurking and stalking your every move and all you can is run, hide, and remember to use the obstacles to your advantage.

How long can you survive?



Watch out for the release of more stages to have different experiences in different chilling locations and multiplayer options for best experience.
